duties_responsibilities.duty: Identify the best method for retrieving specimens from patients/members.
Remain calm and professional in stressful situations.
Interact with patients/members both in person and by telephone.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent required.
One-year experience as a phlebotomist in a medical facility required, OR a minimum of six months experience as a phlebotomist in a medical facility accompanied by a diploma in Phlebotomy.
CPR certification required within 90 days of employment.
Clear English communication skills both written and oral required.
Filing, typing and computer skills required.
Previous Phlebotomy experience with Newborn, Pediatric, Adolescent, Adult and Geriatric patients preferred.
